name: Floating Cuboid (itch)
description:
You are an infinitely jumping cube, that doesn't mean that the challenges in front of you become any easier however, sometimes it is hard to stop yourself and sometimes you go too far, but can you make it just like you were before, in one piece?

This game was actually made in about 3-4 weeks, but it took many months before I finally got around to finishing it. The game has you go through 20 levels filled with all kinds of challenges that you have to get through. You can jump and infinite amount of times while mid-air but you cannot stop your horizontal momentum. Watch out for death blocks because they will certainly be your doom. There are a total of 3 endings in the game and you will get a star on the title screen for each one!

Controls:

Left and Right arrow keys - Move
Z - Jump
Mouse to navigate in menus

Credits:

SeventyFour Productions - Programming / Graphics / Music / Some sounds / Story and concept

Bro. Three - Sounds

Freesound.org - Sounds, individual people that made the sounds are credited in the game.
